name: scrollable-actor-attribute-lists
title: Actor Attribute Lists (With Scrolling)
description: A macro that displays the data fields usable in roll commands (e.g. @abilities.str.mod) for the selected actor. This is a fork of relick's module that includes horizontal scrolling on the tabbed attribute list (https://github.com/relick/FoundryVTT-Actor-Attribute-Lists)
author: hagelyh
